description: Basic physical attack.
name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
camera screen: target, front center, 20
camera focus: target, front center, 20
wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>
<Ally Party Limit Gauge: +1>
<JP Gain: 8 + Math.randomInt(10)>
